name: Dice Goblin 1000
description:
Follow a courageous goblin as they make their way down to the depths of dungeons while fighting monsters with their trusty dice bag. Make your way up to 1000 points to finish the game! And let the dice decide your fate...

This game was made for the GMTK2022 with the theme

ROLL THE DICE! WARNING! The web version unfortunately does not have *particles*. Oh and is a bit laggy too, sorry.

Controls:

Move left and right with A D keys
Jump up using spacebar
Aim with your mouse and click to cast your die! 

Credits:

Coded using Godot Engine!
Art is made using Aseprite and Clip Studio Paint.
Sound Effects were made in BFX

Thanks for playing!
